result.ga: Ainmníodh go poiblí na daoine a bhí ciontach
result.orig: Ainmníodh go poiblí na daoine a bhí ciontach
result.html: Ainmníodh go poiblí na daoine a bhí ciontachThose guilty were named publicly.
result.ponchtml: Ainmníoḋ go poiblí na daoine a ḃí ciontaċThose guilty were named publicly.

result.eng: There were hundreds of people at the public meeting.
result.ga: Bhí na céadta daoine ag an chruinniú poiblí
result.orig: Bhí na céadta daoine ag an chruinniú poiblí
result.html: Bhí na céadta daoine ag an chruinniú poiblíThere were hundreds of people at the public meeting.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí na céadta daoine ag an ċruinniú poiblíThere were hundreds of people at the public meeting.

result.html: D'fhógair muid go poiblí éWe announced it publicly.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟógair muid go poiblí éWe announced it publicly.

result.eng: He is a good public speaker.
result.ga: Is maith an cainteoir poiblí é
result.orig: Is maith an cainteoir poiblí é
result.html: Is maith an cainteoir poiblí éHe is a good public speaker.
result.ponchtml: Is maiṫ an cainteoir poiblí éHe is a good public speaker.

result.eng: I don't like speaking in public.
result.ga: Ní maith liom bheith ag caint go poiblí
result.orig: Ní maith liom bheith ag caint go poiblí
result.html: Ní maith liom bheith ag caint go poiblíI don't like speaking in public.
result.ponchtml: Ní maiṫ liom ḃeiṫ ag caint go poiblíI don't like speaking in public.

result.eng: Race is not discussed publicly in America.
result.ga: Ní phléitear cine i Meiriceá go poiblí
result.orig: Ní phléitear cine i Meiriceá go poiblí
result.html: Ní phléitear cine i Meiriceá go poiblíRace is not discussed publicly in America.
result.ponchtml: Ní ṗléitear cine i Meiriceá go poiblíRace is not discussed publicly in America.
